snippet: A state appeals court has denied custody and visitation rights to a lesbian who helped rear her companion's two children before the couple broke up.   The decision, issued Thursday by the First District Court of Appeal, said that the woman seeking...
lead_paragraph: A state appeals court has denied custody and visitation rights to a lesbian who helped rear her companion's two children before the couple broke up. The decision, issued Thursday by the First District Court of Appeal, said that the woman seeking custody had acted as a "loving mother" but that her status was not the same as a biological or adoptive parent.

headline.main: Lesbian Is Denied Custody After Breakup
